title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 95.8 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 95.8 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) There shall be
no fee charged for
(1)

Inspection of
records. (2)

Search for records, except that a reasonable fee may be charged in the discretion of the chief
executive officer or the secretary to the Authority where such search will
entail an inordinate length of time. (3)

Any certification pursuant to this

Part. (b) (1)

Except as otherwise provided by the rules
of the Authority, copies of records shall be provided at a fee of 25 cents per
page not exceeding 8 1/2inches by 14 inches in size. (2)

The fees for other types of copies or
transcripts and for certification shall be such reasonable amounts as the chief

Executive officer or the secretary to the Authority shall establish. Notwithstanding the above, the aforesaid chief executive officer or the

Secretary to the Authority may, in his discretion, waive all or any portion of
the fees authorized by this section for any records or class of
records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
95.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
